thread.title: Lesley Collins
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Lesley Collins

author: Lesley Collins
title: Lesley Collins
text: Highly recommend this service. I chose to buy a personalised cushion for an 18th gift, which I was able to design myself out of a wide range of templates. All very easy to navigate around too. Delivery was extremely quick and I'm highly delighted with the professional job done! Reasonably priced to boot!
